commentary.text: Sehwag on strike, Mandeep is the non-striker, Starc to bowl
$$Kohli$$ $$wins$$ $$the$$ $$toss$$ $$and$$ $$RCB$$ $$will$$ $$bowl$$
For RCB, Sachin Rana and Albie Morkel are playing instead of Rilee Roussow and Ashok Dinda
For Kings XI, Balaji is back and Shivam Sharma is making his IPL debut. They replace Rishi Dhawan and Murali Kartik
Kohli said RCB prefer chasing here with the small outfield, and he is also expecting some rain later
Roshan Kumar: "Sanjay Bangar has proved to be a great tactician, fielding an off spinner against lefties dominated RCB lineup can be masterstroke"
$$7.10pm$$  Clash of the big batting line-ups tonight in Bangalore as Royal Challengers take on Kings XI.
Vedang: "Maxwell's presence will be the best thing that can happen to RCB! This will definitely bring the best out of Gayle. "
Lohit Reddy: "And how can someone forget Sehwag..He looks in touch..just a matter of time before he explodes!! "
Adway Lele: "@James: Forgetting Yuvi now, are we?"
James: "Gayle, Kohli, AB, Maxi, Miller, Bailey. Bowlers will be applying for more rewarding jobs. Like sweeping the streets."
Suresh: "The best game of IPL at the best possible ground. Bowlers take a hiding!"
------------------ Have you tested your  $$CricIQ$$  today? Use the time in the lead-up to the game wisely.  $$Play!$$
Starc to Sehwag, $$FOUR$$ ,first ball flies to the left of third man for four, Sehwag pushes at a full delivery that starts to come in outside off, and there is no stopping the thick edge
Starc to Sehwag,no run,full one smacked right off the middle of the bat but straight to extra cover
Starc to Sehwag,no run,this one is slanted wider on a good length across Sehwag, he has a go at it, and is beaten
Starc to Sehwag, $$FOUR$$ ,this length ball swings in but down the pads, and Sehwag tickles it fine
Spidercam: "Sehwag's simple mantra of his career. "As long as I am at the crease, I will entertain". Works most of the time"
Starc to Sehwag,1 wide,fuller now, but starts leg stump and moves down the leg side
Starc to Sehwag,1 leg bye,yet again on the pads, but Sehwag cannot get bat on this full delivery, it scoots to the right of square leg
Starc to Mandeep Singh,no run,Mandeep beaten first ball with a 145 kph length ball that bounces and zips past his prod outside off
Albie Morkel
Morkel to Sehwag,no run,starts back of a length into the right-hander, Sehwag cannot work it away as he hops and is hit on the thigh pad
Morkel to Sehwag, $$FOUR$$ ,Morkel bowls a similar delivery, short of a length, coming into Sehwag, this time he is ready, moves back, hops, and works it past short fine leg
Morkel to Sehwag,1 run,a length ball close to off, Sehwag goes on the back foot and punches, they have a deep point for him
Morkel to Mandeep Singh,no run,spots some width on this short of a length ball and cuts hard, to cover, does not time it
Morkel to Mandeep Singh,1 run,Aaron throws and misses from short fine leg, but Sehwag would have been in even if it had it, Mandeep had worked a length ball with the angle to Aaron
Morkel to Sehwag,no run,tries to go back and punch but it comes in again from just outside off, and the thick inside edge goes to square leg
Starc to Mandeep Singh, $$FOUR$$ ,shot, not much width on this pitched up delivery, it was straightening too, Mandeep stayed beside the line and opened the face to square-drive through point
Starc to Mandeep Singh,1 run,leans forward and across this time to guide a length ball to third man
Raghav: "If they are holding back Varun Aaron for Maxwell, they should probably want to use Chahal as early as possible. Maxwell will bury any spinner in the world"
Starc to Sehwag,no run,nearly spooned it to backward point, Sehwag went after this back of a length ball, but could not time the punch, fell short of Yuvraj
Starc to Sehwag,1 wide,slants this back of a length ball outside off, Sehwag ducks
Starc to Sehwag,1 run,opens the face and pushes softly at this one leaving him on the angle, it does not carry to Gayle's left at wide slip
Starc to Mandeep Singh,no run,worked off the pad to square leg
Starc to Mandeep Singh,2 no balls,pitched up into the pad, they take a single as the ball rolls square on the leg side, and Starc has also overstepped
Starc to Sehwag,1 wide,he bowls a slower one outside off, Sehwag cannot reach it, keeper and bowler cannot believe it is called wide, they are right too, that was well inside the marker
Round the stumps
Starc to Sehwag,no run,Sehwag cannot do anything with the free hit again, Starc angles it in close to off, good length, Sehwag swings and misses
Morkel to Mandeep Singh,1 run,hit high on the pad off an inside edge as this jags in after pitching, Sehwag pushes Mandeep for the single as the ball rolls towards slip
Morkel to Sehwag,1 run,goes back and whips this incoming delivery through square leg, the man from the deep rushes in to prevent the second
Morkel to Mandeep Singh,2 runs,Starc does well to run across from third man, dive and stop it just in front of the rope, Mandeep had cut this hard and it was travelling
Morkel to Mandeep Singh,1 run,makes some room outside leg, steps out, tries to bash this back of a length ball through the off side, but mishits it to mid off
Morkel to Sehwag,no run,Sehwag survives as he plays from the crease, Morkel has been moving them in sharply after pitching but the batsman gets an inside edge onto pad
Morkel to Sehwag, $$FOUR$$ ,makes room now, this does not come in, and Sehwag swats the length ball over point
Varun Aaron
Aaron to Mandeep Singh,1 run,clear run out chance but AB cannot pick up the ball as he runs in from extra cover, Aaron started with a quick and full one that Mandee[p dug out to the off side
Aaron to Sehwag,1 run,just short of a length, towards the pad, Sehwag helps it to fine leg
Aaron to Mandeep Singh, $$FOUR$$ ,a bouncer at 142 kph, into the batsman, around shoulder height, Mandeep hooks hard, and the top edge flies over the keeper
Aaron to Mandeep Singh,1 run,the next ball is pitched up, but Mandeep handles it well, pushes it late and softly in front of extra cover
Aaron to Sehwag,2 runs,short of a length, Sehwag goes back and works it in front of square, they hesitate till it beats the fielder's dive and then run
Aaron to Sehwag,1 wide,145 kph from Aaron, but of little use as it is sprayed well down the leg side
Aaron to Sehwag,no run,145 kph again, tight line just outside off, just short of a length, Sehwag guides it to point
James: "Hope Aaron and Yadav are picked for the England tour. Good to see some aggressive Indian fast bowling."
Harshal Patel is on
HV Patel to Mandeep Singh,2 wides,131 kph full toss sent miles down the leg side to start off, Parthiv does well to stop it with a dive
HV Patel to Sehwag, $$FOUR$$ ,just clears mid off's jump, Harshal pitches it up outside off, Sehwag does not move the feet at all., but smashes it cleanly as he reaches out with the bat
HV Patel to Sehwag,1 wide,yet another ball slanted down leg
HV Patel to Sehwag,1 run,very full and into the pad, whipped straight to deep square leg
HV Patel to Mandeep Singh,1 wide,the wide problems continue for RCB, Harshal sends a slower one down leg now

HV Patel to Mandeep Singh,5 runs,RCB keep leaking runs, Mandeep jabs this one close to the pitch on the leg side, bowler rushes for it, a direct hit could have had Mandeep in trouble, but Harshal's throw is so wild, mid off cannot stop it from rolling into the boundary even with a dive
HV Patel to Sehwag,1 run,opens the face and runs this length ball around off to third man

HV Patel to Mandeep Singh, $$OUT$$ ,Mandeep's tried to launch this full and wide one down the ground, but he's mishit it tamely to mid on, he's struggled to time the ball tonight, and the struggle is over now
The Big Show at the crease
HV Patel to Maxwell, $$FOUR$$ ,he is away with a four first ball, a full toss outside off, Maxwell opens the face, places it past backward point, and his timing is good enough to beat third man
Spinner brought on, Chahal to bowl
Chahal to Sehwag,1 run,Sehwag goes back to a length ball which straightens and stays low, but he pushes it down to long on without trouble
Chahal to Maxwell,1 run,legbreak straightening on middle, worked in front of square leg
Chahal to Sehwag,1 run,legbreak with some width, Sehwag rocks back and cuts hard, but sweeper keeps them to only a single
Chahal to Maxwell,1 run,turned through vacant midwicket for a single
Chahal to Sehwag, $$OUT$$ ,Sehwag falls in the first over of spin, charges out to a flighted ball on off, tries to launch Chahal over long on but he's only gone as far as the fielder
Chahal to Maxwell,1 run,flat delivery forced wide of long on but Kohli charges across to keep them to one
Yuvraj to bowl
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell,1 run,full delivery worked through midwicket
Parag Kajrolkar: "Good move by Kohli to bowl Chahal!! Those who were wondering why a spinner for Maxwell, I tell you they brought him for Sehwag and the plan worked!! Sehwag did what he does!!"
Yuvraj Singh to Miller,1 run,skips out, and works this off the pad behind square leg
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell, $$SIX$$ ,Maxwell tees off early, he comes out, and swipes it hard and high and straight, short followthrough, but so effective
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell, $$SIX$$ ,and again, Yuvraj bowls it wider, but Maxwell is down in a flash and smacks it straight again
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell,1 wide,sprays it short and wide down leg, Maxwell swivels for a big pull but misses
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell, $$FOUR$$ ,drags it short once more, Maxwell pulls again, and this time it flies to the deep midwicket rope
Yuvraj Singh to Maxwell,no run,Yuvraj beats him last ball with one bowled slower outside off, Maxwell slogs and misses
Chahal to Miller,1 run,flat and slanted across the left hander, punched to the sweeper
Chahal to Maxwell,1 run,Maxwell slog sweeps, flat and on the bounce to deep midwicket
Chahal to Miller,2 runs,goes back and across and pushes at one angled across, the ball runs to backward point, who fails to stop it
Chahal to Miller,1 run,flat, quick and wide, cut to sweeper cover

Chahal to Maxwell, $$OUT$$ ,Maxwell lives and falls by the slog sweep, Chahal bowls a flat legbreak on middle, Maxwell goes down on his knee and swats it, Starc is around on the edge of the deep midwicket rope, and it helps that he is tall

Chahal to Bailey,no run,not something you see often in T20, Bailey's padded up to this tossed up googly, what a ball to get first up, didn't pick it, thought he could leave it alone, he is hit just outside the line of off stump on the flap of the right pad, but the appeal is turned down
Aaron to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,shortish, fast, wide, Miller cuts it in a flash to the deep backward point boundary
Aaron to Miller,no run,short of a length, punched to the off side, extra cover comes across to field
Aaron to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,short ball, 138.4 kph, Miller swivels and pulls in front of square leg, there is a man in the deep, he has no chance as it is placed well wide of him
round the stumps
Aaron to Miller,no run,beats him with a 144.5 kph back of a length ball that is angled in but holds the line even as Miller pushes forward
Aaron to Miller,2 runs,overpitched, Miller clobbers it to the left of the sweeper, but Yuvraj reaches there with a dive to stop the boundary
Aaron to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,no stopping this one, Miller is forward to a pitched up delivery and drives it past extra cover
Chahal to Bailey,no run,nicely bowled, Bailey pushes forward to a flighted legbreak that dips, spins and bounces past the outside edge
Chahal to Bailey,1 run,low full toss pushed down to long on
Chahal to Miller,no run,flights it full on the pad, Miller clips it to midwicket
Chahal to Miller, $$SIX$$ ,full and angled across just outside off, it does not turn, Miller picks it from there and hammers it over way over long on
That ball is not coming back
Chahal to Miller,1 run,flat at 87.5 kph, Miller goes back and slaps it to the sweeper
Chahal to Bailey,no run,Bailey is having a hard time dealing with Chahal, he goes back to a flat and quick legbreak that spins away a touch and beats his waft
Morkel round the stumps
Morkel to Miller,1 run,angles it in on a length, is pushed down the ground
Morkel to Bailey,no run,back of a length, wide, but Bailey can only chop it to point
Morkel to Bailey,no run,closer to off stump now, Bailey tries to run it past point, cannot beat Gayle there
Morkel to Bailey, $$OUT$$ ,Bailey's gone, he never looked in touch tonight, Morkel angles it in, just short of a length, close to off, Bailey goes pushing at it, and edges it behind
The ball's slipped out of Morkel's hands in delivery stride
Morkel to Saha,no run,good delivery, coming in a bit towards off, good length, Saha pushes off the front foot to point
Morkel to Saha,no run,fuller just outside off, Saha leans forward to push to short extra cover
Shrikar: "Punjab seem like a one trick pony.. the trick being maxwell.."
Starc to Miller,1 run,short of a length, into the left hander, turned square on leg
Starc to Saha,1 wide,141 kph length ball slips down the leg side
Starc to Saha,no run,takes a hand off the bat handle as he pushes at this length ball angled across him, cannot get the single
Starc to Saha,1 run,full and wide, Saha reaches for it and squeezes it  between extra cover and mid off, hasn';t timed it, and AB stops it with a dive
Starc to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,short and wide, Miller accepts the offering and comes forward to smash it well out of the reach of sweeper cover
Starc to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,this has almost gone flat for six, incredible hit, Miller's made some room, come forward and punched it over mid off, the strike is so clean it falls inches inside the rope
Starc to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,Starc bowls it short and widish, Miller opens the face and guides it just past backward point, timed too well for third man
Chahal to bowl out
Chahal to Saha,no run,pushes a full one to short extra cover
Chahal to Saha,1 run,skips out and pushes along the ground to long off
Chahal to Miller,1 run,shortish googly, Miller comes across and punches to long on
Richie: "So what if you don't have Max time, now enjoy the Miller time.!! woot woot.."
Chahal to Saha,1 run,nudged off the pad to short fine leg
Chahal to Miller,1 run,another wrong 'un, widish outside off, Miller slaps it to the sweeper
Chahal to Saha,1 run,Saha steps out and turns this fullish delivery to long on
Morkel to Saha,no run,Saha walks outside off but his push to this full ball finds short extra cover
Morkel to Saha,no run,Saha is costing his side some momentum, this is short and wide, and he's chopped it weakly to point
Morkel to Saha,2 runs,opens the face and guides it wide of third man, and scurries back for the second
Morkel to Saha,1 run,walks down the track and turns this length ball to long on
round the stumps
Morkel to Miller,1 run,angled short of a length down the pads, but Miller cannot swat it too wide of fine leg
Morkel to Saha,no run,full and wide, Saha reaches for it and misses
Aseem: "Leaving Maxwell and Miller aside, KXIP are actually a weak batting team. Their amazing consistency has papered over all weaknesses so far."

Shane: "Chahal HAS to be the best spinner on show this IPL. Mishra, Ashwin, Jadeja who are all Indian test players have been made to look very ordinary compared to this bloke. Perhaps only Tambe comes into the BEST SPINNER conversation."
HV Patel to Miller, $$SIX$$ ,Starc in business at deep midwicket again? No, this shortish ball is pulled just over the tall man's jump
HV Patel to Miller, $$SIX$$ ,a length ball from round the stumps, Miller's reached for it and sent it soaring onto the roof of the stadium beyond the long on boundary, 50 off 23 balls for Miller
HV Patel to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,another boundary, this is short and angled in down the leg side, Miller's pulled it behind square, Chahal dives but it slips through
HV Patel to Miller,2 runs,a slower length ball, Miller picks it from outside off again and checks the stroke over midwicket, Starc runs around to it
HV Patel to Miller,1 wide,he bangs it in short, it rises slowly but too high, Miller lets it go
HV Patel to Miller,1 run,hit to Gayle at backward point
HV Patel to Saha, $$SIX$$ ,Saha gets hold of one now, this is his favoured stroke, takes this full one from well outside off and sweeps it just over the deep square leg rope
Aaron to Miller, $$FOUR$$ ,shot, Aaron angles it across on a length, there is plenty of width, Miller needs to place his punch, and he does it, past Starc's dive at sweeper cover
round the stumps
Aaron to Miller,no run,full and wide outside off, Miller stretches for it, misses

Aaron to Miller, $$OUT$$ ,he's tried to place this full toss wide of sweeper cover again, but he has to clear extra cover first, and Chahal has dived to his right to take a sharp catch there, but his effort could be in vain, Aaron seems to have just overstepped, his foot is on the line, but does not seem to have any part behind it, but Miller's been given, oh well
Aaron to Johnson,no run,ripper to fellow fast bowler first up, sharp bouncer at 144 kph, Johnson hops and fends it square on the off side
Aaron to Johnson,1 run,tries to pull another short ball, just drags it past the bowler to long on
Aaron to Saha,2 runs,full on middle, turned in front of square leg for a couple
HV Patel to Johnson, $$SIX$$ ,there is no Miller, but Harshal goes for six first ball of the over as Johnson flicks a length ball angled in over square leg
HV Patel to Johnson,2 runs,he's smashed this low full toss straight into the bowler's left shin, it;s hit so hard it ricochets far enough for them to take two
HV Patel to Johnson,1 run,full and wide, Johnson stretches for it and squeezes it past the bowler
HV Patel to Saha,2 runs,Saha drives a full delivery past Gayle's dive at point and they take two more

HV Patel to Saha, $$OUT$$ ,a wide slower one, Saha mishits it high and AB comes in from long off to take it, he then throws it right back at Harshal and the bowler goes down, he's taken some blows this over
HV Patel to Johnson,no run,another slower one, Johnson swings at the length ball close to off and misses
Aaron to Patel,1 run,length ball on middle and leg worked down to long on
Aaron to Johnson,no run,Johnson swings and misses again, as Aaron angles this slower one across him
Aaron to Johnson,no run,in the blockhole just outside off at 142 kph, Johnson cannot connect
Aaron to Johnson,1 run,lifts this full delivery on the bounce to long off
Aaron to Patel,1 run,slashes hard and it flies to Harshal at third man, he takes it inches inside the rope, the momentum takes him over, he releases the ball just before, and prevents the six
Aaron to Johnson,1 run,full delivery drilled down to long off
Starc to Johnson,1 leg bye,angles it into the left hander, who misses, and the ball goes square on the off side
Starc to Patel, $$OUT$$ ,he tries to make some room, but Starc is fast, right in the blockhole, and into middle stump before Patel can do anything about it
Starc to Shivam Sharma, $$FOUR$$ ,Shivam on IPL debut gets a short ball outside off, and steers it in the air, fine to the third man rope
Starc to Shivam Sharma, $$OUT$$ ,Starc angles it in from round the stumps, Shivam makes room and swings, the yorker slips under the arc and hits the stumps second time in the over
Starc to Balaji,1 run,drives a full delivery to sweeper cover
Starc to Johnson, $$FOUR$$ ,Johnson walks across outside off, and ramps the full toss over short fine leg

Maxwell did not fire too long tonight but Miller did. Kings XI made 28 in the last 3.3 overs after his dismissal. Will that cost them? A target of 190-plus has been chased successfully once in six attempts on this ground before, by RCB against Kings XI  $$in$$ $$2010$$

name: Royal Challengers Bangalore v Kings XI Punjab
